Home.heroSubtitle: Authentic Thai Massage in Bern City Center
Home.featuredSubtitle: Discover therapeutic Thai massage for stress relief and back pain.
Home.aboutText1: Founded in 2026 by Mrs. Kumjuan Vecchi, Suksan Massage brings authentic Thai healing arts to Bern, Switzerland.
Home.aboutText2: Experience the benefits of traditional Nuad Thai massage in a serene environment designed for relaxation.
Home.aboutText3: Professionalism is our priority. Mrs. Vecchi is certified by the famous <bold>Wat Pho Thai Traditional Medical School</bold> in Bangkok.
Home.aboutText4: All our therapists are certified experts with over <bold>10 years of experience</bold>. Relax in our 'Rose & Forest' ambiance.

Services.title: Our Services
Services.subtitle: Experience the art of prepared relaxation with our authentic treatments.

thai.title: Traditional Thai Massage
thai.description: A therapeutic massage that combines acupressure, Indian Ayurvedic principles, and assisted yoga postures. Perfect for relieving muscle tension and improving flexibility.

oil.title: Oil Massage
oil.description: A gentle and relaxing massage using aromatic oils to soothe the body and mind. Improves circulation and relieves stress.

foot.title: Foot Reflexology
foot.description: Based on the principle that reflex points on the feet correspond to organs and glands in the body. Promotes overall health and well-being.
